deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev Prevents a contract from calling itself, directly or indirectly.
 Calling a `nonReentrant` function from another `nonReentrant`
 function is not supported. It is possible to prevent this from happening
 by making the `nonReentrant` function external, and making it call a
 `private` function that does the actual work.
@dev Function version returns uint depending on what version the contract is on
@dev function stake accepts an amount of bHOME to be staked and creates a new updateEvent for it
@dev function distribute accepts a wallet address and transfers the BaconCoin accrued to their wallet since the user's Last Distribution
@dev Function withdraw moves tokens that were unstaked by the caller to the caller's wallet

distribute(address).details: function distribute accepts a wallet address and transfers the BaconCoin accrued to their wallet since the user's Last Distribution

stake(address,uint256).details: function stake accepts an amount of bHOME to be staked and creates a new updateEvent for it

unstake(uint256).details: Function unstake begins the process of withdrawing staked value. After a timeout,    the amount will be available to withdraw. If you calling account already has an unstake pending   the new amount will be added to the pending amount and the timeout will reset.

version().details: Function version returns uint depending on what version the contract is on

withdraw(uint256).details: Function withdraw moves tokens that were unstaked by the caller to the caller's wallet
